021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.ParseMoney;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.bukkit.impl.BukkitCMDSource;
025import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Command;
026import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Default;
027import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Description;
028import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Named;
029import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Usage;
030import revxrsal.commands.bukkit.actor.BukkitCommandActor;
031import revxrsal.commands.bukkit.annotation.CommandPermission;
032
033/**
034 * ShortCommands
035 *
036 * @author creatorfromhell
037 * @since 0.1.2.0
038 */
039public class ShortCommands {
040
041  @Command({ "givemoney", "givebal" })
042  @Usage("Money.Give.Arguments")
043  @Description("Money.Give.Description")
044  @CommandPermission("tne.money.give")
045  public void onGive(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("account") final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney parseMoney, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
046
047    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onGive(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, parseMoney, currency, region);
048  }
049
050  @Command({ "giveallmoney", "giveallbal" })
051  @Usage("Money.GiveAll.Arguments")
052  @Description("Money.GiveAll.Description")
053  @CommandPermission("tne.money.giveall")
054  public void onGiveAll(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
055
056    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onGiveAll(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, currency, region);
057  }
058
059  @Command({ "givenote", "+note", "addnote" })
060  @Usage("Money.GiveNote.Arguments")
061  @Description("Money.GiveNote.Description")
062  @CommandPermission("tne.money.givenote")
063  public void onGiveNote(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency) {
064
065    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onGiveNote(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency);
066  }
067
068  @Command({ "balmenu", "mybal" })
069  @Usage("Money.MyBal.Arguments")
070  @Description("Money.MyBal.Description")
071  @CommandPermission("tne.money.mybal")
072  public void onMyBal(final BukkitCommandActor sender) {
073
074    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onMyBal(new BukkitCMDSource(sender));
075  }
076
077  @Command({ "pay" })
078  @Usage("Money.Pay.Arguments")
079  @Description("Money.Pay.Description")
080  @CommandPermission("tne.money.pay")
081  public void onPay(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("account") final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency) {
082
083    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onPay(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency);
084  }
085
086  @Command({ "setmoney", "setbal" })
087  @Usage("Money.Set.Arguments")
088  @Description("Money.Set.Description")
089  @CommandPermission("tne.money.set")
090  public void onSet(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("account") final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
091
092    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onSet(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency, region);
093  }
094
095  @Command({ "takemoney", "takebal" })
096  @Usage("Money.Take.Arguments")
097  @Description("Money.Take.Description")
098  @CommandPermission("tne.money.take")
099  public void onTake(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("account") final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
100
101    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onTake(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency, region);
102  }
103
104  @Command({ "bal", "money", "eco", "balance" })
105  @Usage("Money.Balance.Arguments")
106  @Description("Money.Balance.Description")
107  @CommandPermission("tne.money.balance")
108  public void onBalance(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
109
110    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onBalance(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), currency, region);
111  }
112
113  @Command({ "balo", "balanceother" })
114  @Usage("Money.Other.Arguments")
115  @Description("Money.Other.Description")
116  @CommandPermission("tne.money.other")
117  public void onOther(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
118
119    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onOther(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, currency, region);
120  }
121
122  @Command({ "baltop" })
123  @Usage("Money.Top.Arguments")
124  @Description("Money.Top.Description")
125  @CommandPermission("tne.money.top")
126  public void onTop(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Default("1") @Named("page") final Integer page, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("false") final Boolean refresh) {
127
128    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onTop(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), page, currency, refresh);
129  }
130
131  @Command({ "transactions" })
132  @Usage("Transaction.History.Arguments")
133  @Description("Transaction.History.Description")
134  @CommandPermission("tne.transaction.history")
135  public void history(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Default("1") final int page, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region, @Default("SELF_ACCOUNT") final Account account) {
136
137    net.tnemc.core.command.TransactionCommand.history(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), page, region, account);
138  }
139}
